availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joshua A. Penton (Louisville, Ky, merchant and prov govt)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant. New York native. Married to Catharine A Shrader Penton in Oldham County, Kentucky, on July 8, 1847. Father of John W. Penton, Isabella Penton, Hellena Penton, Kate Penton, Georgiana Penton, and Ida Penton. Farmer in Oldham County, in 1850. Owned a feed store in Louisville in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville, Kentucky, in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham, Division 1, p. 146A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 4, p. 77
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film #000482448.
